name: RocketPods
description:
Thrust your way through the galaxy's HARDEST obstacle courses! RocketPods is a rage-inducing flying game where you must finish each level without crashing!

Start out as a novice, and leave as a Legend. Unlock the rarest RocketPods [collect 7 unique Pods], earn EXP, and attain new Rankings. Compare your pilot profile and mission results with your friends for competitive play!

The galaxy of RocketPods is vast and replete with trillions of planets! Visit exotic gas giants that feature beautifully pre-rendered 3D artwork and animations!

Game Features:
-7 unique RocketPods to fly and unlock
-Explore 50+ levels/5 gas giant worlds
-9 different Rankings to attain
-Vibrant pre-rendered 3D artwork
-Race your friends and compare post-flight stats
-Unlock and fly the RCS, a RocketPod that requires quick thinking and rapid typing to operate
-Features controller and keyboard support

Upcoming Early Access Features:
-Unlock 20 extra levels and other modes

Controls:
-Arrow Keys & WASD
-Space or Enter to select
-Backspace or Escape to return
